item.description:
Ok summer is fading fast and I know you want to keep your sexy tan into the winter:-) I am looking to set up the net at Revere Beach this Saturday for a couple of hours (11 - 2pm) and looking a few good players who know how to play beach volleyball (not picnic volleyball). There will either be 2x2 or 4x4 but no more...so you must know how to set.

Please seriously RSVP soon if you're interested so that I know to plan for Saturday. Small group is fine with me.
item.name: Revere Beach V-ball On Saturday 9/1
